name: Life (pke1029)
description:
LD46 entry, a game based on Conway's Game of Life.

Music by Tiziana Comito

Source code available here: https://github.com/pke1029/tic-life

Controls (classic mode):
arrow keys: navigate menu
z: select
left mouse click: turn on cell
right mouse click: turn off cell
spacebar: pause
F8: screenshot
F9: record gif

Controls (mini game):
arrow keys: navigate
spacebar: shoot
